hopobject.name: WinCE7 BSP for BeagleBoard-XM
hopobject.pname: Official Windows Embedded Compact 7 BSP for BeagleBoard-XM
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; InfoPath.2; MS-RTC LM 8; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; Zune 4.7; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body: BSP includes support for DVI, Mouse, Touchscreen, Ethernet, USB, Audio, microSD, NAND, GPIO, Battery. Based on TI reference BSP for DM37x. Available for free in a binary evaluation version which enables the Windows CE OS to be evaluated on the Beagleboard-XM. A low cost commercial license is available which provides all the source code and includes getting started support.
hopobject.shortdesc: Complete Windows Embedded Compact 7 reference BSP for BeagleBoard XM, developed by Microsoft Gold Partner Adeneo Embedded
